TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lived before his arrest in the town of GPE , GPE . He is currently residing in GPE .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE several persons were arrested in Khudzhand on suspicion of membership of ORG ut - GPE ( “ ORG ” ) , a transnational NORP organisation , banned in GPE , GPE and NORP republics . CARDINAL . On DATE the deputy Prosecutor General of GPE ordered the applicant 's extradition to GPE . The decision , in its relevant parts , read as follows :

“ ... [ Mr ] ORG is charged with having actively participated in DATE in the activities of a criminal organisation “ NORP - ut - GPE PERSON ” , aimed at the violent seizure of state power and the overthrow of the constitutional order and banned on the territory of NORP by a court decision ...
